Name: PREPARE
About the game: Welcome to the Project PREPARE. This game is about a soldier who is invited to participate in a special training program and become an elite soldier. Since his physical abilities are perfect, the training relates exclusively to the use of a weapon in training simulations (tests). In over 20 tests you can prove yourself whether you have the constitution of an elite soldier. Trophy room where you can see your progress and medals.
